attributes.action: Keep GP surgeries as we know them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have already lost local access to Accident and Emergeny units in our local hospitals, the journey's becoming 30 minutes or more. If we move to super surgeries effecively the rural communties will become devoid of local medical services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
